item.title: Roblox: Specter Codes (May 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Specter Codes
  • How to Redeem Specter Codes
  • How to Get New Specter Codes

Specter is a unique Roblox experience that allows you to become a professional ghost hunter. There, you will need to use various devices to detect different paranormal activities. Once you find all the clues, you will be able to guess the type of ghost you are dealing with. The game features special coupons that you can redeem for bonus rewards, and here we will tell you about these Specter codes.

Updated May 19, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A new code is now available in Specter , offering a fresh item you can claim right away. You can also find a mix of cosmetic rewards and in-game currency from the other active options. These can give your characters a new look or help you build up resources. Be sure to check back often for future updates.

All Specter Codes

Working Specter Codes

  • AMENITIES – Gives you Case. (NEW)
  • FLORAL05 – Gives you skin.
  • EASTER2025 – Gives you Exclusive Outfit and 5 Vault Tokens.
  • 4SYLUM – Gives you Exclusive Outfit and 5 Vault Tokens.
  • WEEKTHR33 – Gives you the Legendary Star outfit for Lawson and Сash.
  • WEEKTWO – Gives you the Сash.
  • 500M – Gives you the 50k Сash.

Expired Specter Codes

  • CLASSICEMF
  • MARCHREVERT
  • BUGGYMARCH

Codes in Specter can provide you with various cosmetic items, such as skins for your Equipment. These cosmetics will help you make your character unique and stand out from other players. Of course, you can purchase some of these items from the shop, but promo codes are also a good way to obtain them.

Unfortunately, coupons in this Roblox game may expire in the future, and we don’t recommend you wait too long before redeeming them. If you don't activate promo codes in time, they will most likely become unavailable, resulting in the loss of all your free rewards.

How to Redeem Specter Codes

The rewards you can get for redeeming Specter codes are nice, but you can’t get them right away. In order to unlock the redemption feature, you will have to play the game for a while. Here is a list of steps you need to follow to activate Specter codes and claim your special bonuses:

  • Launch Specter and wait for the game to load.
  • After that, learn the basics of this Roblox experience and play for 1+ hours. This is necessary to unlock the redemption menu.
  • Once you have access to the redemption menu, open the Home tab in the main menu.
  • Look at the upper right corner of the screen. There, you will need to find the Codes button and click on it.
  • Type the code you want to use in the menu that pops up.
  • Click on the Redeem button.
  • The reward is yours.

How to Get New Specter Codes

The developers may add new Roblox codes in the future, and we will update this article if this happens. Feel free to bookmark our guide and use it as a source of information on rewards you can get for free. Also, you could follow the official media related to Specter :

  • X Account
  • Discord Server
  • Roblox Group
Roblox
271
8.7 /10
Released
September 1, 2006

WHERE TO PLAY

item.title: Roblox: Tattoo Studio Tycoon Codes (May 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Tattoo Studio Tycoon Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Tattoo Studio Tycoon
  • How to Get More Tattoo Studio Tycoon Codes

Tattoo Studio Tycoon is an exciting tycoon simulator in which you will need to develop and build your own tattoo empire. Passively earning Cash, you will step by step, object by object, decorate your own studio where tattoo artists will work and bring you even more income.

As in other Roblox games, in Tattoo Studio Tycoon , you can redeem codes to get cool rewards from the developers. In this case, you will get tons of Cash, which is enough for a successful start and partial development of your tattoo empire.

Updated May 19, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: You can now claim a fresh reward to boost your in-game cash. This new addition makes it easier to expand your studio or grab new upgrades. Be sure to use it while it’s active. Stick around in case more rewards drop soon.

All Tattoo Studio Tycoon Codes

Working Tattoo Studio Tycoon Codes

  • May23UPD - Redeem this code to get 10,000 Cash. (NEW)
  • TurnOnNotis - Redeem this code to get 10,000 Cash. (NEW)
  • MoreUpdatesSoon - Redeem this code to get 10,000 Cash. (NEW)
  • TATTOO - Redeem this code to get 10,000 Cash.
  • FollowZachRD - Redeem this code to get 10,000 Cash.
  • TattooInk - Redeem this code to get 10,000 Cash.

Expired Tattoo Studio Tycoon Codes

There are currently no expired Tattoo Studio Tycoon codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

Redeeming Tattoo Studio Tycoon codes will be especially useful for beginners who have just started playing and have no Cash at all. With the codes, you will greatly replenish your capital in a matter of seconds, and with these funds, you will be able to upgrade your business a lot, so do not neglect it.

How to Redeem Codes for Tattoo Studio Tycoon

Redeeming Tattoo Studio Tycoon codes will not be a problem, especially if you have had similar experiences in other Roblox games. For less experienced players, we've prepared a step-by-step guide on how to get freebies:

  • Launch Tattoo Studio Tycoon .
  • Pay attention to the right side of the screen. There will be several buttons and options. Among them, interact with the blue Codes button.
  • This will open the redemption menu. Here, enter one of the active codes from the list above in the input field that says “Enter Code”.
  • Next and last, click on the green Redeem button next to the input field to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Tattoo Studio Tycoon Codes

To find more Tattoo Studio Tycoon codes, just visit the game's official social media pages. The game developers often share new Roblox codes here to reward an active community and attract even more players. Just be careful not to miss anything.

  • Official Tattoo Studio Tycoon Roblox group.
  • Official Tattoo Studio Tycoon game page.
  • Official Tattoo Studio Tycoon Discord server.
  • Official Tattoo Studio Tycoon X account.

item.title: Marvel Rivals Could Inspire a Very Different Kind of PlayStation All-Stars Game
item.description:
The rapid success of Marvel Rivals has proven that with great IPs must also come great gameplay, something which PlayStation All-Stars Battle Royale fell short of achieving. Focusing too heavily on brand recognition to carry the game to success may have been the downfall of PlayStation All-Stars Battle Royale .

The ability to team up with a diverse cast of Marvel characters is Marvel Rivals ’ primary hook, but what gives it real staying power is the execution of its game design, standing out as one of the best modern hero shooters. This is something PlayStation All-Stars could learn from. Where Marvel Rivals uses its characters to enhance gameplay, PlayStation All-Stars lacked the content and appeal offered by other major platform fighter series like Super Smash Bros. A sequel is not entirely ruled out, but to truly succeed, it may be a good decision to change genre and follow Marvel Rivals ’ lead.

PlayStation All-Stars Should Return as a Hero Shooter

Hero Shooters Are Bigger Than Ever

In recent years, the hero shooter has slowly become one of the most popular genres. This surge started with titles like Team Fortress 2 and Overwatch , with more recent additions including Deadlock , FragPunk , and Marvel Rivals . The future of the genre looked bleak due to the cancellation of Hyenas and Concord shutting down, but Marvel Rivals pushed the boundaries of hero shooters and breathed new life into the genre. Though the Sony-published Concord was short-lived, this doesn’t mean that it shouldn’t try again with a different franchise.

Much like Marvel Rivals , a PlayStation All-Stars hero shooter may have a competitive edge over others in the genre because of the power of its IPs. PlayStation All-Stars Battle Royale ’s roster was the game’s main selling point, and since its initial release, PlayStation’s first-party catalog has expanded massively. A PlayStation All-Stars follow-up using PlayStation’s new IPs could set itself apart in the expanding hero shooter genre and live up to its title by including more beloved gaming all-stars.

The hero shooter genre may actually be a better fit for PlayStation’s characters. While it aimed to differentiate itself from Super Smash Bros. by leaning more into traditional fighting game mechanics, some of PlayStation All-Stars Battle Royale’s playable characters originated in shooters. Their skills were generally adapted well to fit a platform fighter moveset, but they would transition much more smoothly into a hero shooter.

PlayStation’s Perfect Opportunity To Revive Older IPs

PlayStation All-Stars Battle Royale celebrates the games of PlayStation’s past, collecting a varied cast of first-party characters, as well as guests who played a prominent role in PlayStation’s history. Recent reports claim that PlayStation plans on reviving its old IPs, and reintroducing them in a game gathering multiple gaming icons may be a great way to do this. This could help to reinvent some characters and give them another chance in the spotlight, giving new players a chance to learn about these older characters whilst acknowledging longtime fans who have patiently awaited their return.

A new PlayStation All-Stars game could benefit PlayStation in a similar way to Marvel Comics. Marvel Rivals frequently calls back to the comics, and in doing this, some players have started to take an interest in the source material. Marvel capitalized on this with a recent Marvel Unlimited promotion in Marvel Rivals , giving players a better opportunity to learn more about their favorite characters. If PlayStation is considering returning to its older properties, a hero shooter with the PlayStation All-Stars branding may be a good entry point.

Players may have already had a taste of this with 2024’s Game of the Year Astro Bot . The game is a love letter to PlayStation and a nostalgia trip for fans. Astro Bot is full of cameos, referencing everything from retro PlayStation originals like Ape Escape to modern third-party favorites like Persona 5 . The game succeeded in celebrating PlayStation’s history, and a new PlayStation All-Stars could expand on this by giving these deep-cut franchises more focus.

What A Hero Shooter PlayStation All-Stars Game Could Look Like

A follow-up to PlayStation All-Stars Battle Royale would likely freshen up its roster, adding representation from some of PlayStation’s more recent titles. Possible returning characters like Ratchet and Clank and Kratos would likely use their modern designs, but PlayStation now has many new additions to draw from. Aloy could lead a PlayStation All-Stars 2 , and with the popularity of The Last of Us and Ghost of Tsushima , it's likely that the protagonists of these series would join the cast.

Another interesting character to include could even be Spider-Man. Insomniac’s Spider-Man games saw massive success, solidifying them as a staple PlayStation franchise. Because of Marvel Rivals ’ Insomniac Spider-Man crossover, this could be the gateway to his inclusion in a potential PlayStation All-Stars hero shooter as well as Marvel Rivals .

Along with adding newer franchises to the game, a PlayStation All-Stars hero shooter should not overlook the classics. The original included iconic PS1 characters like PaRappa the Rapper and MediEvil ’s Sir Daniel Fortesque, but it was missing some guest characters that were important to this era. Adding icons like Crash Bandicoot and Spyro in PlayStation All-Stars would give the game more fan service that the original was missing.

Though PlayStation All-Stars Battle Royale borrowed some ideas from Super Smash Bros. , it managed the crossover aspect in a unique way. As much as the playable roster represented many different franchises, PlayStation All-Stars ’ stages were mashups of multiple series at once, taking the idea of crossovers even further. These included references to series that were not represented by the playable cast, such as Patapons attacking God of War ’s Hades. A follow-up title should retain this, adding unique stage mechanics from multiple PlayStation titles.

PlayStation, wanting to revive its underutilized franchises, should not overlook PlayStation All-Stars . It’s deserving of its own revival, and would be a great way to show dedication to these revival plans by preparing players for which series will be revisited. PlayStation All-Stars has the potential to be a great hero shooter, and with the success of Marvel Rivals , now might be the perfect time for this to become a reality.

item.title: Lands of Jail Codes (May 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Lands of Jail Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Lands of Jail
  • How to Get More Lands of Jail Codes

Lands of Jail is a mobile strategy game with simulation elements where you play the role of a prison warden on the Isle of the Banished. Your task is to restore stability in this chaotic environment, manage the prison, develop the infrastructure, and control the most dangerous criminals.

To speed up your development and make your start in the game more comfortable, we have collected the latest Lands of Jail codes for you. They will bring bonuses in the form of resources, currency, and other useful gifts that will definitely help you take control of the situation.

Updated May 19, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A fresh code has been added, giving you another chance to stack up on Diamonds, Supply Cards, and Speed-Ups. These rewards can help you push forward a bit quicker, especially if you’re building momentum. Check back often so you don’t miss future drops.

All Lands of Jail Codes

Working Lands of Jail Codes

  • LOJ3648 - Redeem this code to get Diamonds, Advanced Supply Cards, and Speed-Ups. (NEW)
  • B4N7L3Q9 - Redeem this code to get Diamonds, Advanced Supply Cards, and Speed-Ups.
  • GuZQdq1KnWQJMx - Redeem this code to get Diamonds, Advanced Supply Cards, and Speed-Ups.
  • xyMsa1TVPq8v7W - Redeem this code to get Diamonds, Advanced Supply Cards, and Speed-Ups.
  • z9pMr8N6zazjs6 - Redeem this code to get Diamonds, Advanced Supply Cards, and Speed-Ups.
  • WELOJAIL111 - Redeem this code to get Diamonds, Advanced Supply Cards, and Speed-Ups.
  • JAILGIFT2025 - Redeem this code to get 1,000 Diamonds, Legendary Hero Shard, and five Universal Speed-Ups.

Expired Lands of Jail Codes

There are currently no expired Lands of Jail codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

Redeeming Lands of Jail codes is a great opportunity for both beginners and experienced players to quickly replenish resources, currency, and other useful items. Considering that it will take you just a few seconds, this is one of the best farming methods in the game.

How to Redeem Codes for Lands of Jail

Before you can redeem codes in Lands of Jail , you will need to partially progress through this mobile game until you catch the first elite prisoner. Before that, the redemption option will not be displayed. When it appears, and you can redeem the codes, here's a step-by-step guide on how to do it:

  • Launch Lands of Jail .
  • Pay attention to the top left corner of the screen. There will be your avatar. Click on it.
  • This will open the Warden Profile menu. Here, interact with the Settings button. It is located in the lower right part of the menu.
  • This will open the Settings menu. There will be several buttons arranged in two columns. Among them, interact with the penultimate one in the first column, which says Redeem.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a gray Redeem button below it. Now, enter one of the active codes from the list above in the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the Redeem button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Lands of Jail Codes

To find more Lands of Jail codes, you will have to devote a little time and patience. The best place to look for them is on the official social media pages of the game, as the developers of this free mobile game publish codes there first. To save you some time, here are the links to the official resources:

  • Official Lands of Jail Discord server.
  • Official Lands of Jail Facebook page.

Lands of Jail is available on mobile devices.
